articles.description: Former Suns coach Earl Watson claims he pushed hard for the team to draft Jayson Tatum in 2017 but was overruled by ownership.
articles.content:

articles.title: How Nick McCloud Impacts The Notre Dame Secondary - 247Sports
articles.description: McCloud immediately becomes Notre Dame’s best boundary corner, which allows Crawford and Bracy to reduce reps and play to their strengths at nickel/field cornerback.
articles.content:
(Photo: Michael Clark, 247Sports)
One roster move – the addition of grad transfer Nick McCloud from N.C. State – puts a much different slant on Notre Dame’s cornerback play and defensive backfield in 2020.

articles.title: AHL after cancellation - A scoring champ, GM and two owners on what comes next - ESPN
articles.description: Hockey's highest minor league ended its 2019-20 season on Monday. Here's how the future looks for various stakeholders.
articles.content:
The American Hockey League canceled the remainder of its 2019-20 season on Monday -- including the Calder Cup Playoffs -- due to the ongoing coronavirus pandemic. Like the NHL, the 31-team minor league had paused its season on March 12.

articles.title: Cardinals plan for ex-Clemson star Isaiah Simmons to focus on 1 role - ESPN
articles.description: Arizona coach Kliff Kingsbury wants to see how first-round draft pick Isaiah Simmons will fare at one position after the ACC Defensive Player of the Year and Butkus Award winner played significant time in various roles for Clemson.
articles.content:
TEMPE, Ariz. -- The Arizona Cardinals were impressed with Isaiah Simmons' ability to learn and play five positions at Clemson. But now Cardinals coach Kliff Kingsbury wants to see how his first-round pick will fare at one position.
